## Random.chance() method

Returns `true` with the given `probability`<!-- -->, which is 0.5 by default (50%).

**Signature:**

```typescript
chance(probability?: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  probability | number | _(Optional)_ Chance of returning true, between 0 and 1. |

**Returns:**

boolean
